title: Startup Founders Meetup & Pitch Night
description: An engaging networking and pitch event bringing together early-stage founders, investors, and tech enthusiasts to share ideas, showcase startups, and build meaningful connections.
overview: This meetup is designed to support Ethiopia’s growing startup ecosystem. Selected founders will pitch their ideas, receive feedback from industry experts, and connect with potential partners and investors.
audience: Startup founders, Investors, Developers, Product Managers, Business Students

title: AI & Cybersecurity Workshop 2026
description: A hands-on workshop focused on practical cybersecurity testing, AI-powered security tools, and modern web vulnerabilities. Designed for developers, QA engineers, and security enthusiasts.
overview: This event will cover real-world penetration testing techniques, OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities, API security, and AI tools used in security testing. Participants will engage in live demonstrations and practical labs.
audience: Developers, QA Engineers, Cybersecurity Students, IT Professionals
organizer: MISS X QA Engineer & Security Researcher
